page.title: 18Farming in our Block
page.content: Being a very rural block,farming plays a very important part in the community. Most of the farms are on the small side. There are a variety of types of farming. The predominant one is dairy and beef farming. The grass in our area is very lush and is good for grazing. After cows, sheep are the most popular livestock farmed in our area. Crops are also grown,for example,potatoes, mangles,swedes and turnips. Most of the farmers are conventional,using chemical fertilisers and insecticides. However, the area does include one organic farm where none of these chemicals is used.
